definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: Conclusion Complex treatment is the most effective method for treatment of residual brun wound.
sentences.chinese: 結論綜合治療是治療燒傷殘餘創面的重要方法。

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the training method of comprehensive competence for junior nurses in burn department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討燒傷科新護士綜合護理能力的培養方法。

sentences.english: The adrenocortical response appears to parallel the severity of the burn .
sentences.chinese: 腎上腺皮質反應與燒傷的嚴重性是平行的。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo find out the cause and actualities of pre-hospital care of pedo-burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解小兒燒傷的致傷因素和院前急救現狀。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the usefulness of keratoplasty with the patients of symblepharon after burns.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察角膜移植治療燒傷後瞼球粘連的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of ulinastatin on organ function in severe burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討烏司他丁對嚴重燒傷患者臟器功能的作用。

sentences.english: Evaluate the usage of radical scavengers in alkali burns of cornea.
sentences.chinese: 探討角膜鹼燒傷後自由基清除劑治療機制。

sentences.english: Objector To evaluate the value of laminar flow in the treatment of bums.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索層流潔淨技術治療大面積燒傷的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the therapeutic effect of biological amnion covering on early severe ocular burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討生物羊膜在早期重度眼表燒傷中的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Reptilase in the burn and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察立止血在燒傷整形手術中的止血效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore diagnosis and treatment methods of a batch of extensive burn combined with burst injury of lung.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討成批特重燒傷合併衝擊傷的診斷及治療方法。

sentences.english: Please prescribe some medicine for the burn.
Product such as not escape, cannot jump high walls, the legs are hot coals burns.
sentences.chinese: 品如無路可逃，無法跳下高牆，腿被炙熱的炭火燒傷。

sentences.english: Venipuncture is a common method used to rescue and treat burned child.
sentences.chinese: 靜脈穿刺是搶救與治療小兒燒傷的常用手段之一。

sentences.english: Objective Present paper aims at Summing up the experience of mass hot cement burn Casulties.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結成批熱水泥燒傷病人救治經驗。

sentences.english: The findings would be helpful to guide the treatment of alkali burns.
sentences.chinese: 這一次發現有助於指導鹼燒傷的治療。

definition: a burn (tissue damage from heat, chemicals etc)/to burn (the skin etc)/(fig.) (of anger, jealousy etc) to hurt (sb)
to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
to die in an accident or disaster/to be killed
